title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 158 - Requirements Concerning New York State Income Tax Returns, Notices, Records And Statements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 158 - Requirements Concerning New York State Income Tax Returns, Notices, Records And Statements

State Regulations

General (§ 158.1 to 158.9)

Information at Source (§ 158.10)

Notices of Qualification as Receiver, Etc (§ 158.11)

Requirements Applicable to Tax Return Preparer (§ 158.12)

Composite Returns (§ 158.13)

Cross-references (§ 158.14)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 158

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 658[g], 697

Except for section
158.12, this Part does not reflect amendments to the Tax Law made by the Tax Reform
and Reduction Act of 1987 (Chapter 28 of the Laws of 1987) and certain other
amendments. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
